title: How to write speech writing - Quora

response.answer_text: Speech writing is rather a hard and complex process which always demands a lot of time and effort. Moreover, in some cases, it requires specific knowledge. I would recommend you have a look at some samples of it in order to understand how should it look like. The next step is to understand what is the main point of your speech and what is your audience. Eye contact is also important while presenting.
